savimpx 0.0.1
  • Reference

    Standard MPX Global Choropleth

    mpx_case_choro.Rd

    Standard MPX Global Choropleth

    Usage

    mpx_case_choro(x, breaks = c(1, 2, 6, 20, 99), latest_date = Sys.Date())

    Arguments

    x

    A Monkey pox data.frame with at least iso3code and cases columns

    breaks

    A numeric vector containing breaks for the choropleth bins

    latest_date

    A date value for the subtitle, latest updated date (default: Sys.Date())

    Value

    A styled choropleth map for use in various data products

    On this page

    Developed by Sean Browning.
